channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AK

item.title: Report X-2024071031
item.description:
Report X-2024071031

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-19T18:15:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-01
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 7/1/2024 at approximately 1200, Dangerous Goods Administration received a call from Employee 261690 at the ramp faiility in Anchorage, reporting a dangeorus goods spill. The shipment consisted one fiberboard box containig 4 plastic drums, individually packaged inside of smaller fiberboard box. One of the plastic drums leaked from the closure, resulting in spillage. This shipment was prepared under IATA Special Provision A197 and did not shipped as fully regulated DG. The shipper will be contacted for further disposition.

item.title: Report E-2024070303
item.description:
Report E-2024070303

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-18T15:13:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-15
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: NORTHERN AIR CARGO, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Shipment was accepted into NAC system on 7/12/24. Shipment was prepared for flight 722 on 7/15/24. During ULD build up the shipment was placed next to another pallet that had a nail protruding that was not visible at the time. This nail crated a small puncture in the bottom of one of the 20L drums causing a release on approximately 8oz of material.

item.title: Report X-2024071064
item.description:
Report X-2024071064

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-05
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: ONE PRESSURIZED SPRAY CAN DISCHARGED ITS CONTENTS INTO THE BOX WHICH THEN LEAKED ORANGE LIQUID OUT OF THE BOX SEAMS. THE PACKAGE WAS PROVIDED TO THE HAZMAT STATION FOR WASTE PROCESSING.
